channel.title: Uncalled Attack v4 - Possibly My Last Project
channel.description:
[center][img]http://kilopscape.webs.com/body-header.gif[/img][/center]
[hr] [b]EDIT: This will probably be my last project before moving on from RSPS and leaving MoparScape. But no need to worry, I may come back :)[/b] [hr]
[b]By the way, there's no credits to that dude who made the HyBriD-PvP client.[/b]
Hey guys; I'm sure a lot of you know about this, but since I've made some more updates, I want you guys to see them, I've made some nice updates ;) Added 634 items and worked with the graphics a little bit. There's so much more to add ;) I've done a ton to a normal ol' Deception source. Check out the pictures: [hr] [img]http://i1095.photobucket.com/albums/i480/uncalled1/newua1.gif[/img] [img]http://i1095.photobucket.com/albums/i480/uncalled1/ua5-1.gif[/img] [img]http://i1095.photobucket.com/albums/i480/uncalled1/ua6.gif[/img] [img]http://i1095.photobucket.com/albums/i480/uncalled1/ua4.gif[/img] [img]http://i1095.photobucket.com/albums/i480/uncalled1/ua8.gif[/img] [img]http://i1095.photobucket.com/albums/i480/uncalled1/ua-sum.gif[/img] [img]http://webzoom.freewebs.com/kilopscape/PartyRoom.gif[/img] Credits to asshole_rule for partay hartay r00m [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/6048/capture003y.jpg[/img] [img]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/1986/capture005m.jpg[/img] [img]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/6979/721201175746pm.png[/img] [img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/9417/ua1k.jpg[/img] Look in the inventory on this image, added 634 items. [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/8564/ua3y.jpg[/img] [img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/7393/ua4ga.jpg[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/1862/ua5d.jpg[/img] [img]http://webzoom.freewebs.com/kilopscape/farm.gif[/img] [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/6898/agilo.jpg[/img][img]http://img200.imageshack.us/img200/5958/agil2.jpg[/img] [img]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/2189/thieve.jpg[/img]

item.title: Uncalled Attack v4 - Possibly My Last Project
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Sorry, I just need a break from things like:

Bearded ladies

I wasn’t sucking ass. Just saying she did Something that You proberly couldn’t do ever… Whats with the Flaming? How old are you 10? Stop using your own Miserable Life for an excuse to pick on other people.

Also, I need to develop other things outside of the RSPS community.

Read full topic

item.title: Uncalled Attack v4 - Possibly My Last Project
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:24, topic:406359”]src\server\Server.java:129: saveGame(server.model.players.Client) in server.model.players.PlayerSave cannot be applied to (server.model.players.Player) PlayerSave.saveGame(Server.playerHandler.players[j]); ^[/quote]

change that line to

PlayerSave.saveGame((Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]);

Read full topic
item.source: Uncalled Attack v4 - Possibly My Last Project

item.title: Uncalled Attack v4 - Possibly My Last Project
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:23, topic:406359”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=503354.msg3689736#msg3689736 date=1312047145]
I believe in the destruct method you would just loop through all players and save there accounts
[/quote]

Actually, thats not really a shutdown hook. If you did that, then you would save if the server crashed, but not if it was closed for some reason.

Well, I added it, but it said that it could not be applied to int after I changed the “c” to a “j” in your saveGame© because it couldn’t find variable c.

Add something this to your main method in server.java

[code]
Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(new Runnable() {
@Override
public void run() {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null)
PlayerSave.saveGame(Server.playerHandler.players[j]);
}

		}
	}));

[/code][/quote]src\server\Server.java:129: saveGame(server.model.players.Client) in server.model.players.PlayerSave cannot be applied to (server.model.players.Player) PlayerSave.saveGame(Server.playerHandler.players[j]); ^

Read full topic
item.source: Uncalled Attack v4 - Possibly My Last Project

item.title: Uncalled Attack v4 - Possibly My Last Project
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

asshole_rule:

I believe in the destruct method you would just loop through all players and save there accounts

Actually, thats not really a shutdown hook. If you did that, then you would save if the server crashed, but not if it was closed for some reason.

Uncalled:

Well, I added it, but it said that it could not be applied to int after I changed the “c” to a “j” in your saveGame© because it couldn’t find variable c.

Add something this to your main method in server.java

		Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(new Runnable() {
			@Override
			public void run() {
				for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null)
						PlayerSave.saveGame(Server.playerHandler.players[j]);
				}
				
			}
		}));

Read full topic

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I believe in the destruct method you would just loop through all players and save there accounts

like so,

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { PlayerSave.saveGame(c); } }

sorry about conventions, but i think it would work.
